Name: Revolutions France 1820-1880
Description:
In Revolutions, you will relive the political conflicts and major societal choices of the 19th century, in France. You will embody the supporters of an ideology. You will fight and negotiate to win over an electorate, ensure the support of the media and the benevolence of the clergy.

On the benches of the assembly or on the barricades, you will define the bases of a new society!

The game lasts 6 rounds maximum. Each round consists of 5 phases.
PHASE 1: SUPPLY. Players receive ACTION CARDS.
PHASE 2: DIPLOMACY AND BETTING. Players plot, negotiate, promise... They then secretly place their action cards on the "Stakes" areas (NOTABLES, SONGS, CLERGY, PEASANTS (from turn 2), WRITTEN PRESS (from turn 3), WORKERS (from round 3), SOCIAL TENSIONS).
PHASE 3: RESOLUTIONS. The bets are resolved. They allow players to gain votes in the CHAMBER or forces in the CIVIL WAR. Players can also modify the SOCIAL TENSIONS to trigger or counter an insurrection.
PHASE 4: STATE MODIFICATION. Players join forces and compete to modify the STATE by taking LEGISLATIVE ACTIONS (Palais Bourbon) or by succeeding in a revolution :


     Modify the Form of the State 
     Change the National Representation 
     Overthrow the executive (faction takes control of the EXECUTIVE)
     Modify rights and freedoms
     Modify SOCIAL TENSIONS: if the marker reaches 15, the phase ends immediately and an insurrection begins.


PHASE 5: VICTORY POINT COUNT - PV. Each player is awarded victory points according to his faction's objectives. If a player reaches a score of "50", he wins the game. Otherwise, at the end of the 6th round, the player with the highest score wins.

Name: A Miracle on Betelgeuse
Description:
Available here: https://ko-fi.com/s/58eb6fa5d6.

A Miracle on Betelgeuse is a Christmas themed game that can also be used as a Christmas Card. Play as Kringle, a down on his luck alien who has has learned of the human ritual known as 'christmas'. Construct a plan for galactic conquest using the christmas ritual and impress your emperor!

A Miracle on Betelgeuse has five mini-games (A,B,C,D,E) that each have their own rules and scoring criteria. Each mini game will contribute to your final score. Each turn you will roll 1 die and assign its result to one of the mini-games to try to maximise your score. The game ends when you have no more actions that you can (or want) to make.

—description from the designer

Name: Cyber Crime Files: Das Geheimnis der Hackerin
Description: Take on the role of a cybercrime specialist and follow a hacker's clues to a major scandal. Analyze newspaper reports, decipher hidden notes and follow the hacker's instructions to discover more evidence. There is no time limit - everything depends on the skill of 1 to 4 investigators.

Name: Underwater Hunt
Description:
Underwater Hunt is a board game that helps children enjoy learning number skills as they find a way to collect gems from the bottom of the sea.  Designed for 1 to 4 players, Underwater Hunt is a great game for developing and sharpening math skills, as they add and subtract their way through the board, strategically using their cards to earn gems.

The goal of the game is to use your diver cards to land on a space that has gems. The first player to collect 5 gems wins.

How to set up
1) Place the chest cards face down on the table.
2) Place 5 gems randomly on 5 blank spaces on the board. 1 gem per space.
    Tips: You may use 5 random diver flash cards to select the spaces for the gems.
3) Place your token on the "Start" space.
4) The dealer deals 5 diver flash cards to each player. The remaining cards not dealt are placed face down on the table to form the draw pile.

How to play
1) The person to the left of the dealer starts play. Players take turn in clockwise direction.
2) You choose a card from your hand and play it faceup on the table.
3) You calculate the sum (or difference) shown on the card and go that many spaces forward.
4) If you land on a space with a gem, you take the gem, and replenish the space with a new gem.
5) If you land on a "miss a turn" space, you will be skipped on your next turn.
6) If you land on a "chest symbol" space, take a chest card and follow the instruction on the card.
7) Keep playing and go around the board until a player collects 5 gems.
8) When you have played all of your cards in your hand, you draw 5 new cards from the draw pile.
9) If the draw pile is empty, shuffle the discard pile and use it as the new draw pile.

Name: Siege Storm: Gunslingers
Description: Proud inventors and best riflemen in the world - they are Gunslingers. They use deadly contraptions and perfect aim to destroy anyone who stands in their way. If you like dealing tons of damage and setting up deadly combos this is faction for you!

Name: Crazy Donut Party
Description:
Are you looking for a simple game for the whole family that requires speed and quick reactions? Congratulations, you've found it!
The game works like this: a buzzer in the center of the table and a stack of donut playing cards for all players. One card is turned over at a time. The player who discovers the complete donut the fastest, buzzes. If the parts fit, the player is awarded with the matching cards. The player with the most cards wins.

—description from the publisher

Name: Cosmic Battle Training CBT Card Game
Description:
Cosmic Battle Training CBT Card Game is a battle simulation card game in which you plot offensive and defensive moves during the strategy phase of each round, then carry out those plans in the action phase. Players start with 3,000 personal defense points, and you win by either building up 3,000 active defense points or eliminating the opponent's personal defense points.

Cosmic Battle Training CBT Card Game was created as a therapy support tool, and at the bottom of each card is a therapeutic principle from cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT) that the card represents.

Name: 静かなる論理 (Quiet Logic)
Description:
Quiet Logic is a real-time deduction game for exactly 4 players which takes around 5 minutes to play.  The game consists of 10 cards which have a different number on both sides.

Each player is given 2 cards, 1 is placed in the center of the table, and 1 is hidden from view.

After looking at both sides of their cards, players decide which sides to place face up on the table and then space them according to some provided principles.

When all players are ready, the game begins and the first person who thinks they have determined the hidden card will write down their guess and check the card.  The first person to successfully guess both sides of the hidden card wins.

Name: Box Against Bangtan
Description:
A BTS themed card game played in the same manner as Cards Against Humanity.

The cards are all about Your favorite boys Jin, Suga, J-Hope, RM, Jimin, V, and Jungkook.

Cards are divided into two groups, the Red (or Black depending on which version you have)cards consist of fill in the blanks or question cards. The white cards are possible answers to the red cards.

Each player holds 7 white cards. One person (the Card Czar) selects a fill in the blanks or question card from the appropriate pile. The remainder of the players choose one of their 7 cards in hand which they feel best matches the reader's card. The Card Czar reads all the answers and selects their favorite. The person whose card was chosen gains the point. Play proceeds around the table until everyone has a chance to be the reader. The amount of points required to win can be a predetermined number.

Name: Battlecrest: Korvu – Hero Set
Description:
How about some more heroes? With more heroes you can get a lot of variety out of your games. You can also play them in solo (either as or against them) and even play 3-4P team games.

Skullcleaver. The Moving Mountain. Peerless Champion of the Drakundra. Korvu has earned many titles over a lifetime of brutal combat. Though many have tried to topple this living legend, the Sakkan fighter has never been defeated. His up-close fighting style is as direct as his philosophy: the first battle you lose is the last.

Components:

     Korvu Hero set: 1 Hero, 1 Health, 4 Action cards.
     Korvu AI Sheet: for solo play, requires Imperator expansion.



What is the mark of a true champion? Legendary heroes clash across the Neververse to find out.

Battlecrest is a card-based tactical skirmish game for 2 players (1-4 with expansions). With perfect information, players must truly outwit their opponent to win.

Characters are composed of 6-card sets featuring a hero card, a health tracker, and action cards. Occasionally a minion or item will replace an action card.

The map is built of 6 cards as well, with the cards randomly placed in a set pattern.

Players take turns maneuvering their characters around the dynamic, and often dangerous map while unleashing powerful attacks. As action cards are used they open up new possibilities and empower the character’s battlecrests. Build up to decisive strikes or refocus to get powers back. Every character has a unique set of actions and preferred tactics, so no two battles play the same.

—description from the publisher

Name: Horizon First Contact
Description:
Horizon First Contact is a cooperative survival board game set in a dark sci-fi setting.

Each player chooses a unique faction and will have to fight against the odds and the incoming threat in order to survive.

Collaborate with your teammates and experience the increasing difficulty and unique mechanics of Horizon First Contact.

Name: 1988: Chirac contre Mitterrand
Description:
In 1988: Chirac contre Mitterrand, each player embodies one of the two French presidential candidates. Each candidate will have to convince public opinion of three qualities expected of a future President of the Republic: charisma, courage and integrity.

On each game turn, you draw three Event cards recalling significant current events from the first cohabitation (1986-1988).

You will have to make a political choice associated with one of these events in order to influence public opinion. You will then put the other two cards back under your opponent's draw pile.

But beware: while some of these choices are more effective, they also expose you to power drain. Abuse of it can result in a cruel and premature defeat!

Name: Schuldig!?: Der Absturz
Description:
The police find a crashed car that has run off the road and hit a tree. What at first looks like a clear-cut accident develops more and more into a complicated case. Of all things, this serves as an examination task for a young team of prosecutors who have to prove their skills by preparing a court case.

The players take on the role of lawyers. In five exciting sections, evidence is sifted through, investigations are carried out and, above all, information is analyzed and evaluated as a team. Together, they decide who seems suspicious and why they should be brought to justice - or whether there are good reasons to prevent exactly that.

There are no dice rolls, pawns or playing cards, players will draw their conclusions through discussions and reasoning with one another.

Name: Spelet om Allsvenskan
Description:
Spelet om Allsvenskan ("The Allsvenskan Game") is a casual strategy game themed for the professional league for men's association football, Allsvenskan (Eng: ”the All-Swedish”).

In Spelet om Allsvenskan, four players (called Rivals) compete in either a complete or short season (double or single fixtures). The game requires four Rivals: in case you are only 2 or 3 players, the game itself will manage the other Rivals according to special ”AI rules”. In this way, players may leave and join during the game: the ”AI” will manage a team while they are gone.

The base rules of the game are simple, but choices can be tricky. A round consists of all Rivals playing their matches simultaneously. Each Rival has to play two cards (a blue and an orange card) on a team in any other match than their own: but each team can only hold one card. A blue card gives scoring chances to both your team and the team you play it on, and an orange card gives scoring chances to both your opponent and the opponent you play it on. As the game progresses, more rules are added that have the Rivals affect their cards with ”success points” that are assembled by winning games.

The game has all the licenses required, so the teams, logos, and arenas are picked from the real world (teams like Malmö FF, IFK Göteborg etc). No knowledge of football is required, but the game is highly competitive as it requires you to win as many matches as you can – and subsequently have other Rivals preferrably lose their games.

Name: Schuldig!?: Explosive Mischung
Description:
A renowned chemistry professor dies in an explosion in a laboratory. The question quickly arises: Was it really an accident? Markus Trakta, the public prosecutor, is convinced it was murder and has a suspect he wants to bring to justice. But he needs help - and turns to you.

The players take on the role of lawyers. In five exciting sections, evidence is sifted through, investigations are carried out and, above all, information is analyzed and evaluated as a team. Together, they decide who seems suspicious and why they should be brought to justice - or whether there are good reasons to prevent exactly that.

There are no dice rolls, pawns or playing cards, players will draw their conclusions through discussions and reasoning with one another.

Name: Schuldig!?: Vollgas
Description:
A pregnant woman is knocked down while crossing a street in broad daylight - but the at-fault car doesn't stop. The police quickly identify a suspect who turns to your law firm for help. Your goal is clear: you want an acquittal for your client.

The players take on the role of lawyers. In five exciting sections, evidence is sifted through, investigations are carried out and, above all, information is analyzed and evaluated as a team. Together, they decide who seems suspicious and why they should be brought to justice - or whether there are good reasons to prevent exactly that.

There are no dice rolls, pawns or playing cards, players will draw their conclusions through discussions and reasoning with one another.

—description from the publisher

Name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Warcry – Thunderstrike Stormcast Eternals
Description:
Sigmar’s immortal champions wield the celestial fury of the God-king, and nowhere in the Mortal Realms is safe from their wrath. Clad in armour and weapons of an ingenious design, they descend from Azyr on bolts of holy lightning. They’ve come to the Eightpoints to punish the followers of the Dark Gods and bring them to order with relentless might.

If you’re looking for a warband that’s incredibly hard to kill and hits with the force of a meteor, the Thunderstrike Stormcast Eternals are where it’s at. You might not get many in your warband, but each one is a match for several mortal warriors, striding through battle like lords of war. This set allows you to build a balanced force of both Vindictors and Annihilators. Their heavy armour means your enemies will have to gang up on you, while your punishing strikes will cull the hordes little by little until you’re left standing on a pile of corpses. The additional cards allow you to bring along powerful leader units and specialised fighters, as well as a Gryph-hound. What more could you ask for?

This warband set contains:


    - 5 Vindictors armed with long spears, tall shields, and awesome masks
     3 Annihilators, which can be equipped with either a large round shield and heavy hammer or an even larger double-handed meteoric grandhammer
     Thunderstrike Stormcast Eternals wound divider and abilities cards, loaded with powerful attacks and magical effects to bring Sigmar’s wrath to the Eightpoints
     18 fighter cards, including 1x Lord-Imperatant, 1x Knight-Arcanum, 1x Knight-Relictor, 1x Knight Vexillor With Banner of Apotheosis, 1x Knight-Judicator, 2x Vindictor variants, 2x Vanquisher variants, 2x Vigilor variants, 2x Praetor variants, 4x Annihilator variants, and 1x absolutely amazing Gryph-hound
     84 tokens, including 24x activation tokens, 32x double-sided wound tokens, 2x initiative markers, 10x special tokens, and 16x objective marker/treasure tokens


—description from the publisher

Name: Blood Bowl: Second Season Edition – The Official Rules
Description:
Hello again, sports fans! Blood Bowl – the legendary game of fantasy football – returns for a new season of ultra-violent sports mayhem. The plays are bigger, the hits are harder, and every game will be filled with moments to remember.

No two matchups are the same. From the moment your team stomps out on the gridiron, your grit, wits, and capacity for grievous violence is put to the test. The action’s fast and furious, but if you keep your head in the game you just might best your opponent and score the most points – or make sure they can’t get back up to stop you. Fame, wealth, and glory await if you win…

Every coach, whether fresh-faced and green or hoary old pros, needs a copy of this essential update.

This 136-page hardback book is absolutely stuffed with everything a budding coach needs to know about Blood Bowl.


     The History of Blood Bowl: from the ancient origins of the game, surrounded in myth and legend, to the evolution of the modern sport. The story of Blood Bowl is as wild as the fanatics who love it.
     Rules and Regulations: streamlined and updated for the Second Season Edition. Everything is explored in detail, from the basics, to recruiting a team, through to the actions your players can take, and the aftermath of the game.
     League vs Exhibition Games: Blood Bowl can be played as one-off matches, and long-running leagues with loads of coaches competing for the top prize. Learn all about both.
     Blood Bowl Teams: Updated rules including new Region and Team Special Rules, a tiered ranking system, and rosters for all 21 current teams.
     Star Players: Every named Star Player now has their own Special Rule. Find current profiles for 23 of them here.

Name: Chaos im Museum: Die Antwort liegt auf dem Tisch
Description:
A quiz game for the whole family with different game variants for young and old. The next big exhibition is coming up, but what is it? All 300 exhibits are lying all over the museum. What a crazy mess! Help the museum director and answer exciting quiz questions in three difficulty levels from five different categories, such as history, culture and technology. Find the right object in this chaos and collect it for your own exhibition. You win the game with the biggest and most beautiful exhibition. So go in search of the greatest treasures in world history and be celebrated as famous museum experts! A fun family quiz with different game variations for young and old.

—description from the publisher
Families: Theme: Fine Art and Art Museums

Name: Shadow War: Armageddon – Rulebook
Description:
Shadow War doesn’t need a copy of the Warhammer 40,000 rules to play – it’s effectively a totally separate game, but sharing the setting and some miniatures.

More than just a reprint of the book that originally appeared in the boxed game, this 200-page rulebook contains a wealth of new content.

The main update is the inclusion of all the factions, previously only available as PDF downloads. By popular demand, two new factions have been added too – the fanatical Battle Sisters of the Adepta Sororitas, and the grim warbands of the Inquisition.

This is a great book for those of you out there with an existing Warhammer 40,000 collection you’d like to play with in a different way, or for anyone who wants a way to play games with a small skirmish force while they build towards a bigger army.

—descripiton from the publisher

Name: Treasure Hunt (fan expansion for Carcassonne)
Description:
Many years ago, because robbery was becoming an increasing problem, some peasants, and even royalty, took to hiding their most precious possessions from the thieves and vagabonds of the
province. The whereabouts of such items have gone, along with their owners, to the grave. In fact, the region is flooded with unclaimed wealth – or spoils, as some peasants prefer to call it. Those lucky enough to discover where this treasure is hid are often rewarded with untold riches, but
others are not so lucky…

Treasure Chest and Key tokens are collected when completing a Road, Field, City or Cloister with those icons. They have 3 colors (Red, Green, Blue). When you collect both the Key and the Treasure Chest of the same color, you can get a Treasure Tile than can give you some benefit, some special Royal tiles to play or some disadvantages like killing your meeples.

Name: BattleTech Legends
Description:
Across the centuries, the fate of the Inner Sphere changed time and again with the actions of one MechWarrior and one Mech fighting at the crux of history.  Their stories became legends passed down through the years, and now these legends and their Mechs stand revealed as never before.

Battle Legends depicts fifty-two of the universe's most famous -and infamous- MechWarriors and their Mechs from every era of BattleTech including the upcoming ilClan era.  Each entry includes gorgeous full0colour portraits of the character and camo specs for their machines, and delves into their battle history as a MechWarrior to reval all-new details never before published.  Finally, each era section kicks off with all-new fiction by some of BattleTech's own legendary authors.

—description from the publisher

Name: Colonial Wargame Rules
Description:
These rules are designed to allow players to role-play officers and leaders in small skirmishes during the colonial wars in the 17th and 20th centuries.

—description from the rulebook

Game can be played solitaire or cooperatively. It's essentially a colonial skirmish game with rules covering 19th century colonial infantry, cavalry, native forces and African animals.

Name: Necromunda: Ash Waste Nomads Gang Tactics Cards
Description:
This set contains 26 cards for use in Necromunda games.

Inside you will find:

18 Ash Wast Nomads Gang Tactics cards and 8 blank Fighter cards, each bearing the mark of the great Ash Waste trives - ideal for marking out Champions and Leaders in your gang deck!

—description from the publisher

Name: Necromunda: Orlock Vehicle Gang Tactics Cards
Description:
This set contains 26 cards for use in Necromunda games.  Inside you will find:

18 House Orlock Vehicle Gang Tactics cards (which can be used by House Orlock gangs and 8 blank Vehicle cards each proudly stamped with the log of House Orlock - the House of Iron.  Ideal for marking out vehicles in your gang deck!

—description from the publisher

Name: InWord
Description:
InWord is a fast word game where you have to find words that contain a random combination of three letters - in the exact order and without interposing other letters.

InWord is a quick word game for 2 to 6 people. You'll discover how many words there are with letter combinations that at first seem impossible.

How do you play InWord?

Reveal three random cards side by side and think of words in which that combination appears - in exactly that order and without interposing other letters.

If you can't think of a single word, you should pass before anyone else. Now you have to hope that nobody in the round can think of a word. Then you will get 10 points directly on your account.
But if at least one person comes up with a word then you get 10 minus points instead.

If someone gets particularly creative, then you simply vote on whether you accept that word. If more than half of the thumbs point up, the word counts, otherwise it just doesn't. Very simple!

Otherwise, the others take turns to name a word. Whoever can't find a word, is out. The person who is the last to have a word then gets the number of words found up to that point as points.

Then the next round begins with a new combination of letters ...

You can end the game at any time if you feel like it. Whoever has the most points wins, of course.

If you have people with you who think too long or if you just want to increase the speed, you can also set a time limit.

—description from the publisher (translated)

Name: WARCHESS
Description:
This wargame was designed by O’Farell & Robinson and printed by Hely’s of Dublin in the 1940s (most likely the early 1940s). It may very well be a prototype. The game was first owned by a Dublin printer in the 1940s and remained within the same family until 2022.

Similar to some other wargames of the era, the objective is to capture the enemy’s GHQ using a variety of combat units while defending your own GHQ. In WARCHESS the units are comprised of infantry, tanks, artillery, forts (which remain stationary once placed), trucks, and trains. The latter two allow you to move eligible units a greater distance. WARCHESS is played on a game board showing a map of Western Europe with square “hexes” created using a vertical and horizontal grid.

Contemporary games to this include Dennis Wheatley’s Invasion (1938) and Campaign (1935) by Wills & Hepworth Ltd. Campaign would be the most similar in play, with WARCHESS being more complicated due to the availability of more unit types.
Families: Players: Wargames with Rules Supporting Only Two Players

Name: Thunderstone Quest: Nature's Wrath
Description:
A new expansion for one of the best Deck Builders, is your party ready for the next quest?

The shaman Kar’nomal has become fed up with the impact of civilization upon the realm of nature. He and his followers seek to control the elemental forces of the world in an effort to let the wilderness in all its forms reclaim the entire world and all life in it. He will seek to strike at the Village, punishing all except those in step with the Elements.

Name: Thunderstone Quest: Rotten Roots
Description:
A new Quest for Thunderstone Quest, This Deck Builder, will take your party to an adventure on a new level!

A new guardian, Filleath has always felt he was destined for more, but it seems he’s always lived in the shadow of greater creatures, none greater than Ashbrow, the great tree guardian of the Deepwood. But a new pact with a being from the Abyssal lands will bring an end to all that. Now armed with dark powers, he will spread a blight that puts the entire forest in jeopardy.

Name: Cultist Chaos
Description:
Cultist Chaos is a card drafting game for 2-6 players. Each player leads their own cult and gains points by collecting magical items, gathering sacrifices, and summoning powerful deities to defeat their opponents.

It is a compact party game consisting of only cards, and only taking 15-25 minutes per round.

Name: Dicetopia: Faction Pack #2
Description: 5 new community based Factions for Dicetopia!

Name: Dan Dare Space Shooting Game
Description:
Dan Dare Space Shooting game by Glevum has a target board featuring 3 enemy spaceships. The gun, as is often the case in British games, is a curious metal device, that fires the shot using a spring mechanism. After a pre-set number of turns, the winner is the one with the most successful hits.

During the early 1950's the Comic Hero Dan Dare spurred several similar target games that can easily be confused. Featured on this link is Glevum's version titled "Dan Dare Space Shooting" game.

Listed elsewhere on BGG is two from Chad Valley; that being simply "Dan Dare Shooting" game and the other called "Dan Dare Big Game Hunt on Venus".

—user summary

Name: Necromunda: Hive War
Description:
Starter box for Necromunda

Necromunda is a world of mines, factories, refineries, and processing plants. The planet is a vast powerhouse of industry, making thousands and thousands of different items for use throughout nearby planetary systems. In the darkness of the underhive, fights between the clan houses over the limited resources are a way of life for the citizens of Necromunda.

Jump into the world of skirmish wargaming with Necromunda: Hive War. Choose your gang and fight thrilling, fast-paced tactical games set in the darkness of the underhive. This boxed set is perfect for new players and contains all of the rules, models, and accessories that you need to start gaming. As well as two gangs, the box also includes enough terrain to build your own little corner of Necromunda.

The boxed set contains:

20 plastic miniatures, each supplied with a Citadel 25mm Round Necromunda Base:
– 10 Escher gang members
– 10 Delaque gang members

– An array of modular terrain
– Double-sided gaming mat
– All of the dice, tokens, cards, and templates needed to play

Also included is a 104-page softback rulebook containing:
– Background on the planet of Necromunda and its Houses
– The rules for playing games of Necromunda
– Multiple scenarios to play through
– Rules for creating your own gang
– Rules for the weapons and wargear available to gangs

Name: Zoo memória
Description:
It's a mess at the zoo. The puppies have escaped and are now running around happily, playing hide and seek. They have no idea that the zoo director is on his way to the entrance. Help them find their way back to their parents before he gets there!

An exciting cooperative game that develops observation skills and encourages players to think together.

Name: Star Realms: Stingray Promo Card
Description:
Name: Stingray
Type: Blob ship
Cost: 2
Attack: 5
When you recycle the ship you gain 2 tokens.

Promotional card given out on a Wise Wizards giveaway via a social media platform.

Name: Luxastra: il Gioco da Tavolo
Description:
From tabletop to YouTube and back! Luxastra finally has its own boardgame: with an easy, yet deep gameplay, you too can become a true hero of a faraway fantasy land. Play alone or up to six players, choose between the six protagonists of the Luxastra Fist Season: each of them has its own tableu, cards, powers... and every one is unique!

In this cooperative adventure game, you move around the city of Fatumastra together with your allies. You will need to find the dreaded Portal of Corialus to defeat one of the many bosses included in the box. To do so, you move tile by tile, facing many obstacles, traps, and enemies and you use your cards to attack, defend, assist your allies and try to pass as many trials as you can. You must be fast: each turn, the enemy Menace might increase... and when it reaches 20 the game is over! Try not to do it too fast, though: being too tired makes you vulnerable, and even one fallen hero will mark the end of your adventure.

May the Raven King be with you!


Dal tavolo alla Rete e ritorno! Luxastra ha finalmente il suo gioco in scatola, l’apice di una lunga collaborazione tra InnTale e Fantàsia Edizioni, firmato dall’autore emergente Gianluca Horton, e in esclusiva assoluta.

Un’esperienza semplice ma coinvolgente, giocabile in solitaria o in gruppi da due a sei giocatori, dove ciascun partecipante può diventare un vero eroe. Scegliete tra i sei Personaggi Giocanti della Prima Serie di Luxastra: ognuno di loro ha la sua plancia, i suoi poteri, il suo mazzo, e tutti quanti sono assolutamente unici ed iconici.

Usate le vostre carte per attaccare, difendervi, curare i vostri alleati e volgere i combattimenti a vostro favore. Ma non dimenticate che le vostre forze non sono infinite, e che restare senza energie durante il combattimento potrebbe rendervi la vita difficile, visto che non potete fermarvi.

Ad ogni turno, dovrete cercare di farvi strada per la città Fatumastra, sempre di corsa tra le sue vie labirintiche. Tra vicoli ciechi, orde di nemici sul piede di guerra, artefatti nascosti nei luoghi più imprevedibili, mentre la Minaccia continua a crescere e la mano invisibile del Fato cala su di voi.

Non c’è tempo da perdere! Perché una volta che la Minaccia raggiungerà il valore massimo, il destino di tutta Delphes sarà segnato, e voi non potete permetterlo. Radunate i vostri amici, sedetevi al tavolo da gioco e accettate la sfida.

Che il Re Corvo vegli su di voi.

Name: Black Powder Red Earth 28mm
Description: A skirmish game with optional longer campaign structures, Black Powder Red Earth 28mm is designed to be fast, violent and streamlined. Games take around 15-20 minutes, and the action begins from turn one — survival is not guaranteed. Bloodshed is.

Name: Demeter: Bonus Objectives
Description:
Two double sided tiles that gives you a total of four new objectives:


     Combination of red + blue cards selected (5 - 6 is silver, 7+ gold)
     Combination of yellow + purple cards selected (5 - 6 is silver, 7+ gold)
     Number of grey cards selected (3 is silver, 4 gold)
     Number of buildings (1 - 2 is silver, 0 gold)


These Bonus Objectives are included in copies of Varuana (Demeter 2).

Name: Conqueror of Dune
Description:
Conqueror of Dune is a game for 1-5 players based on the books by Frank Herbert about desert planet Arrakis, also known as – Dune. In this game, player will take control of one of 5 houses; house
Atreides, house Harkonnen, house Corriono, house Ordos or Fremen tribes. Objective of the game is to accumulate the highest influence in the Lanssrad and control at least 3 locations on the planet. To do this, players will use Spice and Troops of their house to sway numerous battles to their advantage.

—description from the designer

Name: Sniper Elite: Eagle's Nest
Description:
The expansion adds two new maps to the game – the infamous Eagle’s Nest and the Heavy Water Facility – each providing the Allied Sniper and the defending Axis forces with new challenges to face.

It also includes 4 alternate Snipers for the Allied player to choose from at the start of the game, each with their own unique skillset and miniature to represent them. Choose between Karl and Rosa from Sniper Elite, Jun from Zombie Army, and Major Eazy from the Battle comics.

Name: Drawing Without Dignity: Expansion Pack 1
Description:
The first expansion to the hit party drawing game, Drawing Without Dignity. Even more fun things to draw with your friends, and introduces a WILD new game mechanic!

—description from the publisher

Name: inTENse
Description:
inTENse is a light and fun roll and write game for infinite players.
Your objective is to fill in the grid with dice rolls to create sums of 10, as well earn bonus points which are added to your score at the end of the game.
The player with the highest score after 10 rounds, wins!

Play alone, or with an infinite # of friends.

Name: Spell Write
Description:
Spell Write is a light and fun roll and write game for infinite players.
Your objective is to fill in the Play Grid with 2-4 letter words, as well as earn bonus points along the way.
The player with the highest score by the end of 14 rounds wins the game!

Play alone, or with an infinite # of friends.

—description from the publisher

Name: Besieged: Build Your Castle!
Description:
Gather Resources. Develop Technology. Build your Castle. Assemble your Army. BESIEGE THE ENEMY!

Play out highly competitive epic siege battles to become the new king! Includes brand new game mechanic - Castle Building!

Draft cards to build a deck, develop technology and strategically build your castle with walls, towers, traps and moats before you besiege each other's castles to kill the King!

Every game is unique, every castle designed becomes the game board. Play is simultaneous for everyone! No taking turns! No boring waits!

—description from the designer

Name: Hätten Sie's gewußt?
Description:
Any number of people can participate in the game.

Pink Cards: Can be played as a question and answer.
However, since it contains a play on words (root play!), only the first word can be said to a player. This now has to form the other words from the existing stem of the word. Whoever brings together the correct words and has the most cards is the winner.

Green cards : The game is played as a question and answer. One player receives all the cards and takes turns asking the other players the questions printed on the cards. Whoever can answer the respective question receives the card. The answer is printed on the back. Whoever has the most green cards at the end is the winner.

As a question and answer game, you can also ask the answer on the back as a question to a fellow player and expand the game according to the rules as above.

Both games are also suitable as quartet games for children. 4 cards with 4 identical characters, which are attached to the top left of the card, belong together and form a quartet. Whoever can lay down the most quartets wins.

—user summary

Name: Addio
Description:
Addio ("Farewell" in Italian) is a solo, print-and-play card game inspired by Ernest Hemingway's A Farewell to Arms. Set on the front lines of Northern Italy during WWI, you must cross the landscape and evade both the Italian caribinieri and the Austro-Hungarian troops to reach the arms of your lover,  who is waiting on the shores of Lake Maggiore.

Failure can come in many forms. You can be captured by dynamic Italian or Austro-Hungarian units, fall victim to starvation, or arrive at Lake Maggiore too broke to purchase the rowing boat needed to reach safety.

At stages in your journey the player counter will rest on cards representing towns, fields, and battles – opportunities, respectively, to find temporary employment and gather intel, forage for food (an activity not without risk), and fight or bribe your way out of trouble. If you opt to travel at night, there’s a fair chance now and again you’ll end up in places you had no intention of visiting.

—description from the designer

Name: リスのタルトやさん (Risu no Tarte yasan)
Description:
The players take on the role of squirrels that live in the forest taking turns to collect resources to make tarts. At the end of a round, if a player has made three tarts, they are the winner.
Each round the players place their squirrels on trees or a tart pile to collect fruit or tart recipes, respectively. Large squirrels can gather two fruits, while small squirrels can only gather one. Once all the squirrels have been placed, they are collected back by the players and any tarts can be made, provided the player has the correct fruits and tart crust available.
In the beginning of each round, the fruit on the trees are refreshed from a bag, and new tart recipes are flipped over and play continues with a new first player.

Name: Darkhouse
Description:
Darkhouse is a one page print and play roll and write game created by Garrett Sendlewski for the 2017 GenCant roll and write contest.

"Congratulations! Today is your first 30 hour shift working in the Darkhouse, the notorious upside down lighthouse that guides the ships that sail the underground sea. The head engineer gnome is on vacation, and it's up to you to cover his 30-hour shift and keep all the power gems in the Darkhouse energized. The job will test your physical and mental endurance! Survive your first day on the job, and your career is all but guaranteed!"

Name: Bretagne TT Version (fan expansion for Ticket to Ride)
Description:
It’s 2120 and some Breton islands are now accessible by train thanks to floating bridges equipped with the latest technology. What will be the best strategy to connect the iconic places of Bretagne? Discover the surprises that some cities have in store for you, as well as new rules for the most adventurous players…

This game follows the same rules as the basic Ticket to Ride Europe game.
This extension offers the possibility to play with 5 additional rules, including Bonus cities, Special actions and Game variants. These additional rules were introduced to speed up the game and reduce the risk of "being blocked".

Great horizons and public objectives are among the new variants introduced.

Published by permission for non-commercial use. All rights to the Ticket to Ride™ name, gameplay, mechanics, and imagery are reserved by Days of Wonder, Inc., who have not endorsed or playtested this expansion.

---

Nous sommes en 2120 et certaines îles bretonnes sont désormais accessibles par train grâce à des ponts flottants dotés de la dernière technologie. Quelle sera la meilleure stratégie pour relier les lieux mythique dont regorge la Bretagne? Venez découvrir les surprises que vous réservent certaines villes, ainsi que de nouvelles règles pour les plus aventureux…

Ce jeu suit les mêmes règles que le jeu de base des Ticket to Ride Europe.
Cette extension offre la possibilité de jouer avec 5 règles supplémentaires, notamment les villes bonus, les actions spéciales et les variantes du jeu. Ces règles supplémentaires ont été introduites pour accélérer le jeu et réduire le risque de "blocage".

Grands horizons et objectifs publics font partie des nouvelles variantes introduites.

Publié pour une utilisation personnelle à des fins non commerciales. Tous les droits sur le nom, les mécanismes de jeu et l'imagerie des Aventuriers du Rail™ sont réservés à Days of Wonder, Inc, qui n'a pas approuvé ni testé cette extension.

Name: Raubbau
Description:
Raubbau (German for overexploitation) is thematically a dungeon crawler, mechanically it is a deduction and bluffing game, which provides significantly more depth than Skull or Liar's Dice / Perudo. Special attention was paid to easy rules and intensive player interaction.

In Raubbau, each player only knows the treasures in his part of the ever-growing mine. If the treasures do not seem sufficiently precious, one can try to get an unknown treasure of another player by skillful deduction. The other players have the chance to react - but they are not forced to. If the other players react, one has to tax their reaction: Are they trying to trick you into awakening the dragon or is there a treasure hidden underneath their tile? A suspenseful atmosphere evolves while players try to trick each other.

Everybody wants to leave the mine, but nobody dares to, because another player might have more treasures. The player who assesses the other players and the situation in the mine best, will win the game.

—description from the designer

Name: Cat-Tastrophe!
Description:
Oh no! The cat's stuck up in the tree, and the firefighter can't get him down! It's a catastrophe!

Grab your handy pole and carefully push out the tree's pegs to help lower the feisty feline back down to Earth. But be careful: don't let kitty fall, or you lose!

Name: Looney Tunes: Looney Boom
Description:
Each player takes the role of a Looney Tunes character in a game of hot potato where the potato is an ACME bomb.
In these funny game, there is no winner, only one loser: the one who explode the bomb.
Every player takes turns trying to pass the bomb ahead without exploding, using several character abilities and, obviously, the ACME products.

Name: Politik
Description:
Politik is a dynamic strategy game of military, political, and corporate control for 2–6 players.  Representing any of 12 nations, players develop distinct identities during their struggle for global supremacy.  They seize territories, orchestrate propaganda campaigns, and pilot companies to conquer markets.  500+ unique cards provide the landscapes, propaganda, companies, assets, and events for each nation to forge its path to power.

Following the Great Collapse, the world is fragmented but finding its way after decades of Imperial disinformation.  Ascending from those ashes, pirate signals entangle the airwaves.  Deserted broadcast stations spark back to life, trumpeting new anthems.  With right and wrong blurred, a disoriented world yearns for truth.  And one nation will decide it.

-description from designer

Name: Steam Battalions
Description:
Steam Battalions is a non-collectible, customized deck XCG, or Expandable Card Battle Game featuring stunning Steampunk & Dieselpunk art in which 2 players face-off against each other, each using a customized deck they create from their own Starter Deck at the beginning of the game. Each Starter Deck contains the same specific 68 cards, from which each player customizes their own deck down to 40 cards plus 3 "deck-diving" Armory Cards, as outlined in the Steam Battalions rulebook.

THE STORY:

In an alternate past, the great wars of the early 20th century are waging high above the clouds and across the mud-filled trenches of Europe. The armies of the World's Superpowers battle for supremacy with elite units forged in brass, iron and steel in a technological arms race powered by diesel and steam. You & your opponent create, customize & command your own elite Steam Battalions of Deck-Dueling Steampunk & Dieselpunk Dirigibles, Airships & Superheroes & send them into battle equipped with powerful Upgrades & Tech in the quest for Victory!

GAMEPLAY:

Steam Battalions is a fast-paced, 1-vs-1 Customized-Deck Dueling Steampunk Card Battle Game for ages 12 & up that takes approximately 30-45 minutes to play. The objective is to be the first player to get 7 victory points (defeating 7 of your opponent’s units), or if your opponent has no units to move out from their trench, whichever comes first.

Players customize their deck, choosing their own balance of the five card types in the game; Unit Cards to send into battle with their own unique abilities & upgrade lines, Tech Cards to grant them special abilities, Power Cards to enable their attacks & Medic Baloon Cards to repair damage during combat. Both players also start with three "Armory" Cards that allow them to search their deck for a desired card at key moments during the game.

Gameplay employs streamlined card combat mechanics with a unique twist on these special "deck-diving" Armory cards that deepens the strategy in ways unique from other card battle games. In Steam Battalions, you can only receive & play "Armory" cards after you lose one of your units. This prevents either player from gaining an insurmountable lead during early gameplay & opens up new strategic choices you won't find in other games.

Unique game mechanics are designed to reduce the 'grinding' of most deck-dueling games while accelerating the pace of turns, combat, customization, upgrades, card-drawing & strategy.


     NOTE : Each player requires their own deck to play, so the game is sold as a complete two-player set of two starter decks. For even further customization, experienced players can purchase additional starter decks & may add cards from as many additional starter decks as they wish, subject to the deck customization rules outlined in the Steam Battalions Rulebook (free for download at link below).


—description from the designer
Families: Players: Wargames with Rules Supporting Only Two Players

Name: Boss Monster: Portable Power Pack
Description: Expansion for Boss Monster 2: The Next Level that introduces the concept of portable rooms, allowing a player to take rooms they have built with a portable effect, and place it back in their hand during the Build Phase. The boss makes all rooms Portable.

Name: I Am Death Now?: Pain Expansion Pack
Description:
Deep in the forest of the Mythical Realm lurks a Researcher Death who hides behind a magical rock with his Death Clipboard to observe and take copious Death Notes. Soon he will venture further... Oh who bloody cares about the exposition, it's MYTHICAL PAIN TIME!

Using 18 new Mythical Pain cards you can inflict 1/2 pain to ANY category!

Also included: 15 more Pain cards, 2 new Test Subjects and 11 new Cheat Cards!

Plus, you can now add a 6th player. That means Kenneth can play now!

Name: New Corp Order: Deluxe Edition
Description:
This is the Deluxe version which was available during the Kickstarter campaign and has items not included in retail version including:

Wooden custom meeples, additional conglomerate cards, 
2 additional companies (6 Cardboard Tiles and 6 cards)

     Public Service Advertising
     Covert


2 additional consultants (8 cards)

     The Networker
     Merger/Advisor


Play follows the same rules as the retail version.

Players pick a secret objective at the start of the game and then use their card to plot, infiltrate, and take over companies and conglomerates. The game ends when the Conglomerate deck is depleted. Then, players compare their position on each of the Media Conglomerates, and the players with a better position get points according the Companies controlled by those Conglomerates. You can also get extra points by securing your Secret Objectives, and controlling Consultants.

There will be cards in this game that can also be used in Peak Oil. In addition, Peak Oil's barrels may be used in New Corp Order.

Name: Barbarossa: Kickstarter Promos
Description:
Part of these were also stretch goals in the Kickstarter campaign.

The set contains the following cards:

     P02 - Fraulein Kleist
     P03 - Li'l Rundstedt
     P04 - Li'l Fuhrer
     P06 - Further Reinforcements x2
     P07 - Li'l Hoth
     P11 - Grenadier Regiment (Cosplay Alternate Art)
     P12 - Panzer Grenadier Regiment (Cosplay Alternate Art)

Name: El Alamein: Kickstarter Promo Cards
Description:
This is a promotional pack of cards released for El Alamein as part of the Kickstarter.

It contains 4 cards:

     P04 - Airfield
     P06 - Das Boat
     34A - Minsk
     35A - Rostov

Name: Vedelsz vagy Mersz?
Description:
Do you drink or dare you? Drinking card game.

"Are you brave?" your new favorite drinking game! This game brings strangers closer together, can break friendships that have lasted for years, and has even helped some people get pregnant. If you’re looking for a game that makes you laugh so much that your tears flow out and you want to get to know the side of others you didn’t know about yet, look no further. The best part is that you probably won’t remember what happened the next day.

How to play:

Shuffle the cards and place them in the middle of the table. The youngest player starts and then moves clockwise. The first player draws the top card and then completes the task on it. If you do not want to, you must drink the amount indicated on the card. Then the next player draws and so on.

Whoever completes the most challenges by the end of the night will be the winner of the game.

Only +18 and up!

Name: WatchList
Description:
One of our high-level deep cover agents has been compromised. Certain individuals have obtained information of their whereabouts and are even now, looking to exchange this for monetary compensation. 
Your mission is to make sure they do not do so. 
Our asset has limited vision and means of communication, but it is vital you work with the asset to find the counter-informants.
Save our informant before the time runs out!

WatchList is a real-time cooperative game. The team search for counter-informants by asking YES or NO questions to their informant. Observe the details of the cards and be descriptive with your questions to quickly identify your targets. Players win if they can find all the counter-informants before the time runs out!

—description from the designer

Name: Federico da Montefeltro: il Duca
Description:
Idea and goal of the game

Players shall compete by developing the duchy of Federico in a fun game for 2-5 players.
Your goal is building districts, combining the most significant works that history has left us, in order to earn points. During the game, you will also leverage the skills of prominent historical dignitaries for opportunities, and events to hinder your opponents.

Name: MITRYS
Description:
Mitrys is a fantasy adventure game based on the Dual Realm Universe (Mitrys Trilogy). Players take role of one of the heroes: Shaman, Assassin, Druid or Warrior. They compete with each other using characters' various advantages.

A player wins, when they completes the Mission from the Mystery Card.

During the game many adventures awaits: treasures, friends and foes. The battles are resolved by rolling the dice. Players will gain experience and will improve their statistics. Collecting spells, items, acquiring companions or learning new skills is also a thing. Sometimes it can pay off to make a small alliance or sabotage the actions of other players. No gameplay is the same. You don't have to read the trilogy to be able to play, but knowing the plot and atmosphere of the universe doubles the pleasure :)

Name: Battle of Midway
Description:
In Battle for Midway players will have the opportunity to take on the role of an American or Japanese air force commander and become a participant in the famous Battle of Midway of 1942, which decided the fate of the war in the Pacific. The game is for two players and its duration depends on the adopted Game Mode.

The war game with COBI bricks combines strategy requiring planning with random elements. The pawns are mini models of block planes on special bases. Every player will easily master extremely simple game rules based on clear icons. The set includes a box, a game board consisting of seven large and two small pieces, 12 airplanes on special stands, action cards, tokens and markers. The included sticker sheet lets players personalize their planes!

Perfectly balanced tactical and random elements make the gameplay exciting every time. Players of all ages can easily duel with each other! Devise clever strategies or let your luck run wild! Feel the atmosphere of the Second World War clash thanks to the amazing graphics. Lead your air fleet to victory!

—description from the publisher

Name: Something Fishy
Description:
The ocean world holds you,  the solo King of the reef, the job of keeping the reef full but not too full.  As fish show up you tell them where to reside, sneakily putting together groups of the same fishes so they will leave and make a home elsewhere. You only have this position for a short time,  and then one of the other fish will take this responsibility. Don't let the reef get too crowded or you fail and the reef falls to decay.

In Something Fishy, a solo mostly abstract game, the player takes the position of Reef King. The job that is placed on each King is to maintain a balance of fishes. Fish tokens are drawn randomly, two each turn. The player will roll three dice to indicate where the tokens may be placed. The player take two of the rolled dice, add them together, forming a number of an area to place the token. 
Each area of the reef, has 1-2 numbers that correspond to it, providing an overlap for each number, so each area has two groups of numbers for placement, kind of like a Venn diagram with "lanes" that hold three fish each, and an area consisting of two lanes that overlap to the left and right groups of numbers as well. 
If,  after the two fish tokens are placed, each area is checked for three or more fishes of the same color; those fish tokens are taken off the board and placed to the side, making more room for others "arriving". If,  after 24 turns and the reef areas have not been overran by having three fish in one lane, you win. If,  after checking for full lanes, and removal of the threes that are duplicates, a lane is still full with three tokens,  you lose.

—description from the designer

Name: Furnace: Interbellum
Description:
Furnace expands into the twenties and thirties of the twentieth century — the interwar period known as the interbellum. In this expansion, you will find new Company cards and Capitalists, new abilities, Manager tokens, variable Capital discs, a set of components for a fifth player, and new Agents for two-player and single-player games. All of this exists within beautiful industrial buildings and structures from the epoch of Art Deco, Constructivism, and Bauhaus.

Interbellum is designed for players who are already familiar with Furnace. The expansion is best played if all of its elements are added to the base game, but if you don’t feel up to it, you can get to know it piece by piece.

Name: Matik
Description:
A puzzle game that requires tactical planning and reacting to the actions of the opponents.

During one game, each participant will perform only 9 actions. Therefore, it is worth considering each play carefully, especially since the opponents are only counting on your error. Fast gameplay, tactical decisions and a strategic approach to the moves made - this is Matik!

HOW TO PLAY ?

     Add a tile or a pawn to the board.
     Watch the movements of the other players.
     Earn points for tiles next to your pawns.


Gra logiczna wymagajÄ…ca taktycznego planowania oraz reagowania na poczynania przeciwników.

W trakcie jednej gry kaÅ¼dy z uczestników rozgrywki wykona jedynie 9 akcji. Warto zatem dobrze przemyÅ›leÄ‡ kaÅ¼de zagranie, zwÅ‚aszcza, Å¼e przeciwnicy tylko liczÄ… na Twój bÅ‚Ä…d. Szybka rozgrywka, taktyczne decyzje i strategiczne podejÅ›cie do wykonywanych ruchów – to wÅ‚aÅ›nie Matik!

JAK GRAÄ† ?


     DoÅ‚óÅ¼ na planszÄ™ kafelek lub pionek.
     Obserwuj ruchy pozostaÅ‚ych graczy.
     Zdobywaj punkty za kafelki przy swoich pionkach.

Name: Battle of Money Exchange: You can well understand system of foreign exchange!?
Description:
For currency exchange, whether it goes up or down, there are good and bad sides to it.
First, there is a gap between rich and poor countries, and everyone wants to import from the wealthy countries.
Therefore, people all over the world buy the currency of the wealthy country.
As a result, the price of the currency rises.
As the price rises, it becomes harder and harder to buy.
In such a situation, if there is another country that can produce the product at a lower price, everyone will buy it there, and the products of the country that used to sell well will no longer sell well.
I made a game out of such a mechanism.

—description from the designer

Name: Draft Scout
Description:
4 years later, The-Magical-Star once every 10,000 years arrives in Japan.
As the approaching, the people have magical power, they have be able to use black magic.
So, it was decided to hold the "National High School Black Magic Golem Championship".
You have been appointed by the principal as a team manager.
Train your students, scout great students and win the Championship 4 years from now!

—description from the designer

Name: The Black Tail's Panda Slayer
Description:
This is the country of panda plush toys.
In recent years, King Panda, who has been hurt his heart by the pandas with the wrong tail color, has finally enforced the "Black-Tail-Slaying-Law".
This made it legal to tear off the black tail.

However, the black tail force is deep-rooted, and even in the black tail slayers unit formed by volunteers, the black tail is secretly mixed.
Hide and cheat on your own black tail, blame the other black tail severely, and with the cooperation of bears and red pandas, let's regain the appearance of giant pandas as it should be!

—description from the designer

Name: Hour of Need: Jade Kid
Description:
This Kickstarter Exclusive expansion was given to backers as a free gift for pledging for the campaign.

The box contains 2 miniatures representing her as a hero or a bystander. It also includes a hero deck, a card divider, and a bystander card.

Name: Hour of Need: Stretch Goals
Description:
This box contains all the stretch Goals Unlocked during the Kickstarter campaign for Hour of Need.

The box contains:


     Fault miniature, her Hero deck and divider
     Lox Lee miniature, nemesis card and divider
     4 translucent Curtain Call miniatures and 1 crisis card
     Acrid miniature, villain deck, divider card, and 4 translucent lackey miniatures
     Timeframe miniature and ally card

Name: Código Secreto: Expansão promocional Brasil
Description: This promo pack is produced by Devir and has 10 cards with 20 new words from Brazilian Portuguese.

Name: Código Secreto: Expansão promocional Portugal
Description: This promo pack is produced by Devir and has 10 cards with 20 new words from Portuguese.

Name: Die Legenden von Andor: Big Box
Description:
Legends of Andor is a co-operative adventure board game for two to four players in which a band of heroes must work together to defend a fantasy realm from invading hordes. To secure Andor's borders, the heroes will embark on dangerous quests over the course of five unique scenarios (as well as a final scenario created by the players themselves). But as the clever game system keeps creatures on the march toward the castle, the players must balance their priorities carefully.

At the heart of Legends of Andor is its unique narrative, the linked scenarios of which tell an overarching story as the players successfully complete objectives. For each scenario, or "Legend", a legend deck conveys the plot of an ever-unfolding tale...one in which the players are the protagonists. A wooden marker moves along the board's legend track at key points during each scenario, triggering the draw of a new legend card, the introduction of new game-altering effects, and the advancement of the story's plot. In the end, the players must endeavor to guide the fate of Andor through their heroic actions, bringing a happy ending to their epic fantasy tale.

Die Legenden von Andor: Big Box includes the Legends of Andor base game, the New Heroes expansion that allows for games with up to six players, a promo "Wolf Warrior" hero, and additional legends and variants on top of those in the base game.

Name: Aventuria: Der Regenbogenfall Teamherausforderung
Description:
Face the forces of nature with your friends! With the blessings of the twelve gods, together you can prevent a catastrophe. Walk together on sacred paths and discover the legendary Rainbowfall on the Cyclops Islands. Don't let evil rule the fortunes of this miracle!

Together with the Aventuria basic box, this cooperative challenge can be experienced with up to 20 players. If you want it particularly exciting, you can also play this adventure with several groups at the same time.

—description from the publisher (translated)

Name: Kanzume Goddess: Promo Cards
Description:
Promotional card set released at conventions and as part of the Kickstarter rewards.

X1101 Ceres
X1102 Mars
B1101 The Norns
B1102 Skadi

Name: Combined Arms: The World War II Campaign Game
Description:
Bolt Action - Combined Arms is a strategic board game that commands the players to face off, seize the initiative and outwit their foe amidst the fog of war. Each game will see you fighting for control of air, land, and sea in order to claim objectives and hold them against the enemy.

Choose your theatre of war, from the western and eastern fronts to North Africa and the Pacific. Each theatre has its own challenges and opportunities, some rewarding control over the sea, some rewarding control over the skies. How many of your precious resources will you sink into each, and how much will be left to control the land? Will you rely on stealth as you move units secretly, springing up where you are least suspected, or will you attempt to overwhelm your enemy with brutal overkill?

Combined Arms can be played as a stand-alone game or players can incorporate Bolt Action, Blood Red Skies, Cruel Seas, or Victory at Sea for an epic continent-spanning campaign. Unique cards link your campaign with your chosen wargames, meaning your choices in the campaign could mean victory or defeat on the tabletop.

This box contains:

Rules booklet
4 game maps covering Northwest Europe, The Eastern Front, North Africa and The Pacific theatres of operation.
Orders Board
Operations Board
6 Card decks
67 Tokens
Plastic Army markers
Plastic Objectives

-description from publisher's website

Name: Shadowrun: Sprawl Ops – Legendary Edition
Description:
Shadowrun: Sprawl Ops is a competitive game for 2 to 4 players that can be played in 60 to 90 minutes. In this cyber-punk worker-placement game, each player controls a team of Shadow Runners that they can send on missions, loan to other players (for a fee, of course), and upgrade with new tech and equipment. Missions are resolved by rolling combinations of custom dice. A diverse team of Shadow Runners gives you access to more combinations of dice, and your upgrades add even more dice to your pool. Take on smaller missions to earn creds. Then, put those right back into more experienced runners, and better gear. Once you think you've got what it takes, send your runners out to attempt to collect one final score. If you fail, don't worry, your doc-wagon contracts will keep your runners in the game. The first player to successfully complete the final mission, and collect that last big score wins the game!

This Kickstarter Collection Includes:

Legendary Base Game
Kickstarter Co-Op Exclusive Expansion
All Kickstarter Stretch Goals
Kickstarter Map Boards
Kickstarter Boards Included:

Toronto
Neo-Tokyo
Berlin

Name: Goons: Survival Kit Expansion
Description: Expand GOONS with 2 more unique Villains! Do you dare spin the lucky wheel of Ol’e Jist or try the Vicar’s Schemes that slowly builds up? The expansion also includes 2 new Goons and 6 new Item Cards!

Name: Goons: 5 Player Expansion
Description: A 5 Player Expansion for GOONS that includes everything you need to get cracking, including a new goon, extra goon board and 20 orange deluxe mini poker chips!

Name: Goons: The Sergey Brothers Solo Expansion
Description: Take on the merciless Sergey Brothers in this solo experience of Goons that also can be used to create more dynamics in 2 player games!

Name: Goons: The Reinforcement Pack
Description: Twelve new exciting Schemes to add to the game! A new Scheme for every Villain ever released!

Name: Goons: Les Promo Card
Description: A promo Goon Card from the original Kickstarter campaign. He has a unique ability of moving cubes around making it easier to take the action you want.

Name: Sugar Heist: Crib of Thieves
Description:
Sugar Heist: Crib of Thieves, a stand-alone and combinable expansion of Sugar Heist, is an action-packed heist game where players collect, trade, and steal candy cards. Quick-to-learn and strategic, Sugar Heist: Crib of Thieves can be played on its own or mixed in with Sugar Heist to create even more great gameplay opportunities!

On your turn, lay down matching sets of candies from your hand and try to draw, steal, and barter for more! The more candy you collect, the closer you are to locking it safely into your Vault. Sometimes though, other players may not want to give you their confectionary treasures and you might have to play a Battle Card. The all new Accessory Cards and Vault scoring add even more variable powers to your game. Execute your strategies and plan your next move to score the most points and win the game! Beg, barter, steal, and battle your way to supremacy in this wacky set collecting game.

-description from publisher

Name: Ancient Souls: Fenrir
Description:
The Aesir sleeps peacefully, knowing that Fenrir is bound until Ragnarök. But is he? You play as the spirit of Fenrir, reborn as a pup. Travel the realms by hunting, scouting and exploring different sites. Your actions will influence how you get stronger. By enlisting the help of Gods and creatures alike, your goal is to free yourself from the torturing reigns of Gleipnir.

In this "choose your own adventure"-campaign, the choices you make will impact what happens next. Will you be able to free yourself? Will the Aesir discover that your spirit has broken free and hunt you down? Will you discover and aid the Vanir's plot against the Aesir? You decide! With the use of modular hexagonal tiles, action-based strength increases and multiple story arcs, each playthrough will feel unique.

A true solo board game, where you play as a wolf. "Choose your own"-adventure campaigns set in Norse mythology. Focused on narrative, exploration, battle, and character building.

—description from the publisher

Name: MEGA Mini Space Cowboys
Description:
Across the Great Void, mankind has colonized planets like islands dotting a vast jet-black ocean. Vital to the Solarline Syndicate are the spacefaring ships that transport passengers, cargo and cattle. But as everyone knows - any ship is only as good as it's crew!

In Mega Mini Space Cowboys, players assemble a motley crew of misfits that find a new family in each other. Shipmates come in all shapes and sizes. Some are skilled pilots, while others specialize in hand-to-hand combat or ship repair. Some are even bounty hunters. But life is not always so black and white. Sometimes under the right circumstances, the criminal can join the crew, bringing their own set of unique skills to a peculiar, yet accepting, new family.

Mega Mini Space Cowboys is a fast-playing 1-4 player strategy game of set collection with exclusive dice and modular mapping. Each turn, roll six dice, each engraved with six symbols: Move, Nano Med Kit, Bounty, Passenger, Crates, or Cattle. Over three consecutive throws, choose what to keep or discard. You can also recruit crewmates from the passengers you meet, or occasionally even the criminals that you track for bounties.

Hey spacer - do you have the moxie to make big Moolings? (in-game money) Can your family of misfits survive distant planet-hopping and navigating the Void? Stay tuned for the next game session of Mega Mini Space Cowboys to find out!

Later, Space Cowboy…

—description from the publisher

Name: Rivenstone
Description:
The Broken Anvil Miniatures Team is proud to present Rivenstone, a brand new tabletop miniature skirmish wargame featuring highly detailed miniatures and thrilling tempo-based gameplay! Rivenstone is an alternating activation, skirmish-style tabletop wargame designed to appeal to players of all experience levels. The rules are easy to understand and play, with loads of strategic depth to explore and experience on the tabletop. Reinforcement mechanics prevent a player from losing to attrition, creating a game focused on tempo based decisions and tactical planning instead.

—description from the publisher
Families: Players: Wargames with Rules Supporting Only Two Players

Name: Merchant Navy at War (fan expansion for Naval War)
Description:
MERCHANT NAVY at WAR 
-    FAN EXPANSION (PnP)
The NAVAL WAR card game (Avalon Hill, Battleline by S. Craig Taylor, Neil Zimmerer) and the “CARDS AT SEA” expansion covered all the AXIS & Allies Warships from WW II and also a few Land-Based Air units. However, this left the majority of heroic seamen unrepresented which are those of the Merchant Navy. This fan expansion endeavours to rectify that omission.

Over 100 new Merchant Navy ship cards and 18 additional play deck cards with complete rules for the new cards and how they integrate into the existing Naval War game play.

This Print-n-Play fan expansion allows you to sink even more ships, ones that normally can’t fight back. You will also sink several Merchant ships at a time.

The Print-n-Play will be in the Files section and any Feedback will be appreciated

Name: El Rif: Una Guerra Olvidada
Description:
The Rif War, also called the Second Moroccan War, was an armed conflict fought from 1911 to 1927 between the Spanish colonial authorities and the French colonial Empire and the Berber tribes of the mountainous Rif region of Northern Morocco.

El Rif: Una Guerra Olvidada ("The Rif, a forgotten war"), is a 2 player card driven wargame which depicts the war in the Rif region of Northern Morocco from 1911-1927.

The Rif includes a deck of strategy cards for conducting campaigns and incorporating the many events and personalities of the war. The Spanish player can build special units 5Legion, regulares, tanks), naval and air units, pacifiy the rebel kabyles, and work towards French intervention. The Rifian player can build up his kabyles, revolt enemy units of the indigenous police and proclame the the Republic of the Rif.

MAP SCALE: Point-to-point system
UNIT SCALE: regiment per counter

Components:
140 1/2” die cut counters
One 22x34" full-color mapsheet showing most of Northern Morocco
54 Strategy Cards
32-page Rule Book including historial background (21 pages of actual rules)

DESIGNER: Ivan Notario
DEVELOPER: Carlos Martin
ART DIRECTOR: Ignacio Notario
MAP ART: Pascal Lapouyade
CARDS & COUNTER ART: Ivan Notario
Families: Players: Wargames with Rules Supporting Only Two Players

Name: Hour of Need: Bystander & Minion Upgrade Pack
Description:
Replace the minion and bystander tokens in your Hour of Need games with highly detailed  miniatures and new gameplay options!

This expansion adds 18 miniatures and 4 reference cards, allowing players to add more visual flare to their games by replacing the minion and bystander tokens with detailed figures. Additionally, this expansion adds new gameplay elements ion the form of special minions and special bystanders, providing minions and bystanders with special abilities!

The box contains:

     9 minion and 9 bystander miniatures
     2 minion reference cards that give setup and special rules for Bruiser or Operative minions.
     2 bystander reference cards that give setup and special rules for Fierce and Fleeing bystanders.

Name: Magic: The Gathering – Challenger Deck: Allied Fires
Description: Allied Fires is a planeswalker control deck. Keep the board clear with cards like Deafening Clarion and Time Wipe, play a bunch of planeswalkers that generate card advantage, and overwhelm the opponent with planeswalker value and even planeswalker attacks with the help of Sarkhan the Masterless.

Name: Cheese & Crackers
Description:
The Queen is planning to host a fancy afternoon tea...and only the freshest cheese and crackers will do. Perfect! You think, cheese and crackers are your specialty! Unfortunately you're not the only one...

Outmanoeuvre the competition in this delightful 18-card worker placement game, to prepare your ingredients and finish making your cheese and crackers before the competition does. Lovely!

The game is played in a series of rounds, each consisting of three phases. Players place workers (phase one), take a total of two actions each (phase two), then workers return to players and action cards are reshuffled and laid out to start a new round (phase three).

Players are racing to be the first to complete making both cheese and crackers, by rotating and flipping their cheese and crackers cards until their cheese card has "8. Cheese!" at the top and their crackers card has "8. Crackers!" at the top, at which point the player yells "Lovely!" to win the game.

-description from designer

Name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Warcry – Lumineth Realm-Lords
Description:
The Lumineth Realm-lords seek to purify the Mortal Realms, scouring the taint of Chaos wherever it’s found. Some brave warbands take the battle to the enemy, striking deep into the Eightpoints itself to hunt the vile servants of the Dark Gods at their source.

With elements of three kits to choose from, this box allows you to tailor your warband to be highly aggressive, defensive, or a balance of the two. They fight like nothing else in the game with ranged weapons, plus heavy armour and loads of unique abilities. Beyond the Vanari Auralan Sentinels, Vanari Auralan Wardens, and the Alarith Stoneguard, you’ll also find fighter cards for a variety of other models from the Lumineth Realm-lords range. Add some cavalry, superbly skilled warriors, and wielders of elemental magic to your warband, and there's nothing that you can't take on.

Contents:
15 Miniatures
  â€£ 5 Alarith Stoneguard
  â€£ 5 Vanari Auralan Wardens
  â€£ 5 Vanari Auralan Sentinels
15 Round Bases (32mm)
Lumineth Realm-lords Wound Divider & Abilities Cards
19 Fighter Cards
84 Tokens

-description from publisher's website

Name: Can't Catch Harry: White Trash Butterflies
Description:
This expansion pack requires the original Can't Catch Harry game (based on the popular card game Spoons) and offers more characters with alternative rules to keep the game fresh.

The White Trash Butterflies expansion specifically includes 5 additional sets of characters from the Odd 1s Out videos (Monsters, Stranger, Riddler, Cats, and Dad) and 20 rule cards to play one per round.

These rules may affect the gameplay based on goals, point values, or actions. Once you have four of the same cards, Designed by James from The Odd 1s Out,

Name: Love Battleship
Description:
Love Battleship is a sex board game for couples. It builds anticipation with every sinking ship as the losing player performs steamy foreplay activities.
The winner is whoever sinks all of their opponent’s ships first. Love Battleship includes game grids for each player. On one grid, each player draws their ships, while on the other you each mark your guesses for where your opponent’s ships are placed. When you successfully sink your partner’s ship, you pick a foreplay or activity card to perform.
Nevertheless, this game is designed for both players to enjoy it whether they win or lose. Love Battleship game is meant to keep the passion alive while having a hot and steamy night in a fun and playful way.
There are 25 intimate activities and 25 foreplay activities included, so you can play this game several times, and each time will be just as exciting as the first. Love Battleship comes with enough game grids to play eight times, but if you wish to play more, you can download or draw additional grids as well.

—description from the designer

Name: Biz
Description:
In Biz, you take over a building and play as the owner of an organization. By identifying the market and the available opportunities, you hire people for your organization. These Human Resources make money for the organization in every fiscal year. There are also competitors who are trying to gain a bigger share of the market.
Biz board game is categorized in Reality games. This simulation game is part of the structure and performance of real organizations. The simulated experience of this board game is a fascinating experience that anyone can have fun with. Factors that affect the development process of an organization in the real world, may not be possible to be identified or experienced in the real world. But in this board game, all the exposed factors can be identified and examined, and with each re-play, a new experience and transition can be discovered. There are a variety of situations in the game, opportunities and human resources may change your predetermined goal. The number of players in this game is from one to four people, and you get a different experience of the game with any number of players and even single player.

Game Goal
The goal of the game is for organizations to achieve the popularity of the top brand in the eyes of the audience. This popularity can be achieved in three ways:

     Popularity gained through the effects of Activity cards.
     The popularity that is formed through Human Resources (Employees) within the organization.
     The popularity that is created for players by earning over 40 points Revenue.


Finally, the sum of the popularity point obtained from these three methods determines the brand popularity of an entire organization.

Game End
The game ends when Time marker cube reach number 8 on Organizational Life Cycle Board (i.e. The 8th round of the game that every player completed their turns).
Organizational Life Cycle Board
.Revenue on 5
Salary on 0 Profit on 5
   This Board is consisting of 8 fiscal years, meaning there are 8 rounds in the game. After placing the Time Marker on fiscal year 8, the game ends. Each player has to take steps, after all the players have taken their turn, that round ends. At the beginning of the next round, you have to repeat those steps again, then to go to the next round.

Employee Cards
There are 66 Employee cards in the game, each employee has two abilities. By hiring that employee with the ability you choose, you bring him/her into your organization.
